video.title: Life
video.synopsis: Discover the glorious variety of life on Earth and the spectacular and extraordinary tactics animals and plants have developed to stay alive.

episodes.synopsis: Witness the extraordinary things animals and plants must do in order to survive and reproduce in a complicated and competitive world.
episodes.title: Challenges of Life

episodes.synopsis: Reptiles and amphibians have used their cold-blooded body plan and sophisticated behavioral innovations to master the planet's harshest environments.
episodes.title: Reptiles and Amphibians

episodes.synopsis: Mammals can be found in every habitat, except the very deepest ocean. But what truly makes mammals stand out is the care they lavish on their young.
episodes.title: Mammals

episodes.synopsis: Fish are the most varied and diverse backboned creatures on the planet, with more than 28,000 species discovered to date.
episodes.title: Fish

episodes.synopsis: Birds have found the most ingenious ways to overcome the many challenges of life. Everything revolves around their unique attribute: feathers.
episodes.title: Birds

episodes.synopsis: Insects are the most diverse animal group on the planet. The key to their success is their unique ability to reshape themselves.
episodes.title: Insects

episodes.synopsis: Every day in the jungles, grasslands, deserts and frozen wastelands, battles are won, fought and lost between carnivores and their prey.
episodes.title: Hunters and Hunted

episodes.synopsis: Marine invertebrates are extraordinarily diverse, ranging from some of the most primitive creatures in the sea to some of the most intelligent.
episodes.title: Creatures of the Deep

episodes.synopsis: Plants have successfully managed to conquer every habitat on the planet by using ingenious and cunning strategies.
episodes.title: Plants

episodes.synopsis: Primates are uniquely intelligent, engaging in problem solving, communication, tool use and intimate social interplay.
episodes.title: Primates
